content:
No, actually...
wherever she wants to sleep,
that's where she'll park her car...

content:
Not knowing much about a new place,
it must be hard to choose...
     <size=30>I'd probably be just as indecisive myself, wouldn't I?</size>

content:
Sani never chooses where to live,
Wherever her car is, that's where she sleeps.
So she doesn't need a <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color>.

content: Ah, I-I'm not trying to encroach on the cardboard boxes' territory! I feel really sorry for those goods... They've been on such a long journey to get here...
